definition: to tear up/to tear to pieces

sentences.english: She punched, thrashed and kicked. She grabbed the music score and tore it to shreds.
sentences.chinese: 她又踢又打，抓起樂譜撕爛。

sentences.english: Does to rags the heavens tear.
Marry swear to wear the torn dress wet with tear.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗發誓要穿撕爛的沾滿淚水的衣服。
她又踢又打，抓起樂譜撕爛。

sentences.english: But please remember I can rip your throat out if I need to.
sentences.chinese: 但請你記住，如有必要，我會撕爛你的喉嚨。

sentences.english: "Good for you," said he, "rip up the cloth.
